summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1634, for the improvement of alley in Block one (1), David S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley from Yesler Way to Washington Street, between First Avenue South and Railroad Avenue, by constructing a concrete bulkhead thereon and paving the same with vitrified brick, under Ordinance No. 17426 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
